isis.stitle: ANTILOCK BRAKES/TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - PRINCIPLES, OPERATION AND SERVICE - COMPONENT FAILURE - TRACTION SOLENOID

svcproc.title: TRACTION SOLENOID
svcproc.para: If this solenoid fails, traction control is disabled, but ABS remains active.

For problems other than voltage, the system will not be restored until the error is corrected, and the controller is cleared using the magnetic reset switch. It should be remembered that the driver will be advised of degraded ABS operation by the instrument panel warning light and standard braking is still available when the ABS system is disabled.
